title: MBMBaM 388: Face 2 Face: The Mystery of the Seven Parrots
description: Pretty much everyone in our family is sick this week! Which means we couldn't record. Instead, we've combined the best bits from our TWO shows in Chicago last year into one super episode! Finally, you can find out why the folks in attendance at these shows won't stop talking about ... the seven parrots.
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy)
